title: Embroidered picture
medium:
Medium: silk and silk-wrapped metal thread embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, stem, and couching stitches with looping (needle made lace) on 4/1 satin foundation
description: Abraham and Isaac in central medallion.  Attributes of the four elements: earth, air, fire, and water in each corner, and attributes of the four continents the middle of each side.
name: Embroidered picture
